description: Live chart from World Bank Indicators API (V2). Shows 'Employment in agriculture, % of total employment (SL.AGR.EMPL.Z)'. Includes property in the data object telling Vega to look at 2nd list item in the API response. Shows how to deal with nested JSON (where a column value is a JSON object), and encodes the nested country name using dot notation in the colour field: 'country.value'. Adds a custom colour scale with the 'range' array.

title.subtitle: By country income classification group. Source: ILO data via World Bank API
